revised_title: Oxidation of Coal Residue and Isolation of Acidic Oxidation Products
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on the oxidation of coal residue using an alkaline solution of potassium permanganate. They discovered that the oxidation process produced a yellow crystalline mass of acidic oxidation products, including mellitic acid and benzene tetracarboxylic acid. These findings provide insight into the chemical structure of coal and its components.
